verses.verse: Manasseh <S%H4519><s%> was <S%H8147>twelve<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> when he began to <S%H4427>reign,<s%> and he <S%H4427>reigned<s%> <S%H2572>fifty<s%> and <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> in Jerusalem: <S%H3389><s%>

But <S%H6213>did<s%> that which was <S%H7451>evil<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> like unto the <S%H8441>abominations<s%> of the <S%H1471>heathen,<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> had cast <S%H3423>out<s%> <S%H4480>before<s%> <S%H6440><s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

For he <S%H1129>built<s%> <S%H7725>again<s%> <S%H853><s%> the high <S%H1116>places<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H3169>Hezekiah<s%> his <S%H1>father<s%> had broken <S%H5422>down,<s%> and he reared <S%H6965>up<s%> <S%H4196>altars<s%> for <S%H1168>Baalim,<s%> and <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H842>groves,<s%> and <S%H7812>worshiped<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H6635>host<s%> of <S%H8064>heaven,<s%> and <S%H5647>served<s%> them.

Also he <S%H1129>built<s%> <S%H4196>altars<s%> in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H834>whereof<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> had <S%H559>said,<s%> In <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> shall my <S%H8034>name<s%> <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H5769>forever.<s%>

And he <S%H1129>built<s%> <S%H4196>altars<s%> for <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H6635>host<s%> of <S%H8064>heaven<s%> in the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H2691>courts<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

And <S%H1931>he<s%> <S%H853>caused<s%> his <S%H1121>children<s%> to <S%H5674>pass<s%> through the <S%H784>fire<s%> in the <S%H1516>valley<s%> of the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2011>Hinnom:<s%> also he observed <S%H6049>times,<s%> and used <S%H5172>enchantments,<s%> and used <S%H3784>witchcraft,<s%> and dealt <S%H6213>with<s%> a familiar <S%H178>spirit,<s%> and with <S%H3049>wizards:<s%> he <S%H6213>wrought<s%> <S%H7235>much<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> to provoke him to <S%H3707>anger.<s%>

And he <S%H7760>set<s%> <S%H853><s%> a carved <S%H6459>image,<s%> the <S%H5566>idol<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> he had <S%H6213>made,<s%> in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H430>God,<s%> of <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> had <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> and <S%H413>to<s%> <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> his <S%H1121>son,<s%> In <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H1004>house,<s%> and in <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I have <S%H977>chosen<s%> before <S%H4480>all<s%> <S%H3605><s%> the <S%H7626>tribes<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> will I <S%H7760>put<s%> <S%H853><s%> my <S%H8034>name<s%> forever: <S%H5865><s%>

Neither <S%H3808><s%> will I any <S%H3254>more<s%> <S%H5493>remove<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H7272>foot<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> from out <S%H4480>of<s%> <S%H5921><s%> the <S%H127>land<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I have <S%H5975>appointed<s%> for your <S%H1>fathers;<s%> so <S%H7535>that<s%> <S%H518><s%> they will take <S%H8104>heed<s%> to <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> I have <S%H6680>commanded<s%> them, according to the <S%H3605>whole<s%> <S%H8451>law<s%> and the <S%H2706>statutes<s%> and the <S%H4941>ordinances<s%> by the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H4872>Moses.<s%>

So <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%> <S%H853>made<s%> <S%H3063>Judah<s%> and the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> to <S%H8582>err,<s%> and to <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H7451>worse<s%> <S%H4480>than<s%> the <S%H1471>heathen,<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> had <S%H8045>destroyed<s%> <S%H4480>before<s%> <S%H6440><s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>
And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> <S%H4519>Manasseh,<s%> and <S%H413>to<s%> his <S%H5971>people:<s%> but they would <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H7181>hearken.<s%>

Wherefore the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H935>brought<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> <S%H853><s%> them the <S%H8269>captains<s%> of the host <S%H6635>of<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H804>Assyria,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H3920>took<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%> among the <S%H2336>thorns,<s%> and <S%H631>bound<s%> him with <S%H5178>fetters,<s%> and <S%H1980>carried<s%> him to <S%H894>Babylon.<s%>

And when he was in <S%H6887>affliction,<s%> he <S%H2470>besought<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H6440>LORD<s%> <S%H3068><s%> his <S%H430>God,<s%> and humbled <S%H3665>himself<s%> <S%H3966>greatly<s%> <S%H4480>before<s%> <S%H6440><s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of his <S%H1>fathers,<s%>

And <S%H6419>prayed<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> him: and he was <S%H6279>entreated<s%> of him, and <S%H8085>heard<s%> his <S%H8467>supplication,<s%> and brought him <S%H7725>again<s%> to <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> into his <S%H4438>kingdom.<s%> Then <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%> <S%H3045>knew<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1931>he<s%> was <S%H430>God.<s%>

Now <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H3651>this<s%> he <S%H1129>built<s%> a <S%H2346>wall<s%> <S%H2435>without<s%> the <S%H5892>city<s%> of <S%H1732>David,<s%> on the west <S%H4628>side<s%> of <S%H1521>Gihon,<s%> in the <S%H5158>valley,<s%> even to the entering <S%H935>in<s%> at the <S%H1709>fish<s%> <S%H8179>gate<s%> and compassed <S%H5437>about<s%> <S%H6077>Ophel,<s%> and raised it up a very great <S%H1361>height,<s%> <S%H3966><s%> and <S%H7760>put<s%> <S%H8269>captains<s%> of <S%H2428>war<s%> in <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1219>fenced<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah.<s%>

And he took <S%H5493>away<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H5236>strange<s%> <S%H430>gods,<s%> and the <S%H5566>idol<s%> out of the <S%H4480>house<s%> <S%H1004><s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4196>altars<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> he had <S%H1129>built<s%> in the <S%H2022>mount<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and in <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> and <S%H7993>cast<s%> them out <S%H2351>of<s%> the <S%H5892>city.<s%>

And he <S%H1129>repaired<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H4196>altar<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and <S%H2076>sacrificed<s%> <S%H5921>thereon<s%> <S%H8002>peace<s%> <S%H2077>offerings<s%> and thank <S%H8426>offerings,<s%> and <S%H559>commanded<s%> <S%H3063>Judah<s%> to <S%H5647>serve<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>
Nevertheless <S%H61><s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> did <S%H2076>sacrifice<s%> <S%H5750>still<s%> in the high <S%H1116>places,<s%> yet unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> their <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H7535>only.<s%>

Now the <S%H3499>rest<s%> of the acts <S%H1697>of<s%> <S%H4519>Manasseh,<s%> and his <S%H8605>prayer<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> his <S%H430>God,<s%> and the <S%H1697>words<s%> of the <S%H2374>seers<s%> that <S%H1696>spoke<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> him in the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H2009>behold,<s%> they are written <S%H5921>in<s%> the <S%H1697>book<s%> of the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

His <S%H8605>prayer<s%> also, and how God was <S%H6279>entreated<s%> of him, and <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H2403>sin,<s%> and his <S%H4604>trespass,<s%> and the <S%H4725>places<s%> <S%H834>wherein<s%> he <S%H1129>built<s%> high <S%H1116>places,<s%> and set <S%H5975>up<s%> <S%H842>groves<s%> and graven <S%H6456>images,<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> he was <S%H3665>humbled:<s%> <S%H2009>behold,<s%> they are <S%H3789>written<s%> <S%H5921>among<s%> the <S%H1697>sayings<s%> of the <S%H2335>seers.<s%>

So <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%> <S%H7901>slept<s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> his <S%H1>fathers,<s%> and they <S%H6912>buried<s%> him in his own <S%H1004>house:<s%> and <S%H526>Amon<s%> his <S%H1121>son<s%> <S%H4427>reigned<s%> in his <S%H8478>stead.<s%>

Amon <S%H526><s%> was <S%H8147>two<s%> and <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> when he began to <S%H4427>reign,<s%> and <S%H4427>reigned<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> in <S%H3389>Jerusalem.<s%>

But he <S%H6213>did<s%> that which was <S%H7451>evil<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H834>as<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%> his <S%H1>father:<s%> for <S%H526>Amon<s%> <S%H2076>sacrificed<s%> unto <S%H3605>all<s%> the carved <S%H6456>images<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%> his <S%H1>father<s%> had <S%H6213>made,<s%> and <S%H5647>served<s%> them;

And humbled not <S%H3808>himself<s%> <S%H3665><s%> <S%H4480>before<s%> <S%H6440><s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> as <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%> his <S%H1>father<s%> had humbled <S%H3665>himself;<s%> <S%H3588>but<s%> <S%H526>Amon<s%> <S%H819>trespassed<s%> more and <S%H7235>more.<s%>
And his <S%H5650>servants<s%> <S%H7194>conspired<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> him, and <S%H4191>slew<s%> him in his own <S%H1004>house.<s%>

But the <S%H5971>people<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H5221>slew<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> them that had <S%H7194>conspired<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H526>Amon;<s%> and the <S%H5971>people<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> made Josiah his son <S%H4427>king<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H2977><s%> <S%H1121><s%> in his <S%H8478>stead.<s%>
